DOC.brief_title: Usage Dapagliflozin Management Type-2 Diabetes Mellitus : A Real World Evidence Study Indian Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study non-interventional , multicentre , prospective , observational study conduct 50 site India . The study target enrol 2000 patient 40 patient per site . The study would enrol T2DM patient are/were inadequately control ( HbA1c > 7 % ) exist anti-diabetic medication prescribe dapagliflozin 3 month prior study initiation . No study medication prescribe administered part study procedure . Patients , treat per Investigators ' routine clinical practice prescribe dapagliflozin 3 month screen enrolment study . Dosage dapagliflozin medication per routine clinical practice prescribe information . The study initiate obtain write approval Independent Ethics Committee ( IEC ) /Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) .
